name: KetoseSweet+™ Liquid
description: KetoseSweet+™ Liquid contains allulose, a rare natural sugar found in maple syrup, figs and raisins — is a safe, non-caloric, non-glycemic sweetener. With just 5% of the calories of regular sugar, it delivers familiar taste and texture without affecting blood sugar levels. Free of strange aftertaste, bitterness, and potential health concerns of artificial sweeteners, KetoseSweet+ liquidwithout affecting blood sugar levels doesn’t impact blood sugar levels. It's safe for those following an ultra-low-sugar diet, plus allulose has been shown to enhance fat metabolism and it may help with achieving and maintaining healthy body weight.
